entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Hunters Point
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 29. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
